segments.pli: “Lokassāhaṃ, bhikkhave, assādapariyesanaṃ acariṃ. Yo loke assādo tadajjhagamaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I went in search of the world’s gratification, and I found it.

segments.pli: Yāvatako loke assādo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
segments.en: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of gratification in the world.

segments.pli: Lokassāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ādīnavapariyesanaṃ acariṃ. Yo loke ādīnavo tadajjhagamaṃ.
segments.en: I went in search of the world’s drawbacks, and I found them.

segments.pli: Yāvatako loke ādīnavo, paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
segments.en: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of the drawbacks in the world.

segments.pli: Lokassāhaṃ, bhikkhave, nissaraṇapariyesanaṃ acariṃ. Yaṃ loke nissaraṇaṃ tadajjhagamaṃ.
segments.en: I went in search of escape from the world, and I found it.

segments.pli: Yāvatakaṃ loke nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
segments.en: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of escape from the world.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
segments.en: As long as I didn’t truly understand the world’s gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.

segments.pli: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokassa assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
segments.en: But when I did truly understand the world’s gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening in this world with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans.
Knowledge and vision arose in me:

segments.pli: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
segments.en: ‘My freedom is unshakable; this is my last rebirth; now there are no more future lives.’”

sections.title: “Mendicants, I went in search of the world’s gratification,…

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha became awakened by understanding gratification, danger and escape.
